tool_description:
IDfy’s Philippines Driving License OCR API allows you to onboard your customers with speed and precision.

Enable them to prefill their onboarding forms instantly, by just uploading or scanning a Driving License – IDfy will digitize the document for you!
title: Philippines Driving License OCR

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: Philippines Driving License OCR
api_list.description:
IDfy’s Philippines Driving License OCR API allows you to onboard your customers with speed and precision.

Enable them to prefill their onboarding forms instantly, by just uploading or scanning a Driving License – IDfy will digitize the document for you!

Use get call on the left and pass the request id to fetch api call results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://philippines-driving-license-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/extract/phl_dl"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "philippines-driving-license-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
